name: com.gamegaard.ultimateinventory
description: A complete and extensible inventory system for Unity, featuring slot-based item management, category organization, item stacking, drag-and-drop support, custom UI integration, ScriptableObject-based architecture, and compatibility with equipment and crafting systems.

name: com.gamegaard.loadingsystem
description: A simple and extensible loading screen system for scene transitions.

name: com.gamegaard.popuptextsystem
description: A powerful and extensible floating text system for displaying damage, healing, status effects, and more. Features animation curves, pooling, TextMeshPro support, and full runtime control.

name: com.gamegaard.questsystem
description: A flexible and modular quest system for Unity projects, built to integrate seamlessly with the Gamegaard ecosystem.

name: com.gamegaard.scenewarpsystem
description: Manage scene transitions through unique spawn points with a robust, editor-friendly system and sample prefabs.

name: com.gamegaard.serializableattributes
description: Expose complex values in editor to create serializable attributes.

name: com.gamegaard.smartareas
description: Smart and modular system for defining and interacting with 2D and 3D areas in Unity. Includes editable shapes, runtime queries, and custom SceneView handles for intuitive visual editing.

name: com.gamegaard.transitionsystem
description: A modular scene transition system with support for custom behaviors and integration with loading screens.
